meanings.meaning_en_US: Of considerable size, height, weight, or capacity.

examples.sentence: They have a [big] house with a garden.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們有一個帶花園的大房子。

examples.sentence: He has [big] dreams of becoming an astronaut.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他有成為宇航員的大夢想。

examples.sentence: The elephant is a [big] animal.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 大象是一種大型動物。

meanings.meaning_en_US: To let something fall or to let something fall to the ground.

examples.sentence: Please don’t [drop] your phone.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 請不要掉你的手機。

examples.sentence: I accidentally [dropped] my keys.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我不小心掉了我的鑰匙。

examples.sentence: She will [drop] the package at your house.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她會把包裹送到你家。

meanings.meaning_en_US: An object that is played with, especially by children.

examples.sentence: The child received a new [toy] for his birthday.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這個孩子在生日時收到了新的玩具

examples.sentence: She enjoys collecting vintage [toys].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她喜歡收集古董玩具

examples.sentence: They played in the park with their [toys].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們在公園裡玩玩具

meanings.meaning_en_US: The part of the human body extending from the shoulder to the wrist.

examples.sentence: She lifted her [arm] to wave.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她舉起手揮揮。

examples.sentence: He injured his [arm] during the game.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他在比賽中傷了手臂。

examples.sentence: The baby reached out its little [arm] to grab the toy.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 嬰兒伸出小手臂去抓玩具。

meanings.meaning_en_US: An extension or branch of something, often describing a division or part of an organization.

examples.sentence: The organization has an educational [arm].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 該機構有個教育部門。

examples.sentence: The charity's fundraising [arm] raises significant amounts.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這個慈善機構的籌款部門籌集了可觀的資金。

examples.sentence: Each [arm] of the business operates independently.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這家公司的每個部門都獨立運作。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A thing that someone says to cause amusement or laughter.

examples.sentence: He told a funny [joke] at the party.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他在派對上講了一個有趣的笑話。

examples.sentence: Don't take it as a [joke]; it was a serious statement.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 不要把它當作笑話；這是一個認真的陳述。

examples.sentence: She has a great sense of humor and always shares a good [joke].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她有很好的幽默感，總是分享好的笑話。

meanings.meaning_en_US: To produce musical tones with the voice.

examples.sentence: She loves to [sing] in the shower.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她喜歡在淋浴時唱歌

examples.sentence: They [sing] songs around the campfire.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們在營火旁唱歌

examples.sentence: Can you [sing] this song with me?
examples.translation_zh_TW: 你能和我一起唱這首歌嗎？

meanings.meaning_en_US: An oval object laid by a female bird, reptile, fish, or invertebrate, containing a developing embryo.

examples.sentence: She made an omelet with three eggs.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她用三個蛋做了蛋捲

examples.sentence: The hen laid a large [egg].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 母雞下了一個大蛋

examples.sentence: They decorated the [eggs] for Easter.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們為復活節裝飾了蛋

meanings.meaning_en_US: Constituting number eighteen in a sequence.

examples.sentence: This is the [eighteenth] time we've met this month.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這是我們這個月見面的第十八次

examples.sentence: The [eighteenth] amendment changed the constitution.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 第十八修正案改變了憲法

examples.sentence: She finished in [eighteenth] place in the race.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她在比賽中獲得了第十八名

meanings.meaning_en_US: A regular gathering place for the purchase and sale of provisions, livestock, and other goods.

examples.sentence: She went to the [market] to buy fresh vegetables.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她去市場買新鮮的蔬菜

examples.sentence: The local [market] is crowded on weekends.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 當地市場在週末很擁擠

examples.sentence: He set up a stall at the [market] to sell handmade crafts.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他在市場上設了個攤位賣手工藝品

meanings.meaning_en_US: Coming before all others in time or order.

examples.sentence: She finished the race in [first] place.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她以第一名完成比賽。

examples.sentence: This is my [first] time in this city.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這是我第一次來這個城市。

examples.sentence: He was the [first] to volunteer.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他是第一個自願者。

meanings.meaning_en_US: To examine something in order to ensure that it is correct, safe, or in good condition.

examples.sentence: Please [check] your work before submitting it.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 請在提交之前檢查你的工作。

examples.sentence: I will [check] the equipment for any issues.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我會檢查設備是否有任何問題。

examples.sentence: Make sure to [check] the weather forecast.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 請務必查看天氣預報。

meanings.meaning_en_US: The number equivalent to 10 tens; 100.

examples.sentence: There were a [hundred] people at the concert.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 音樂會上有一百人。

examples.sentence: He scored a perfect [hundred] in the test.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他在考試中得了滿分一百。

examples.sentence: A [hundred] years ago, things were very different.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 一百年前，事情非常不同。

meanings.meaning_en_US: Human beings in general or considered collectively.

examples.sentence: Many people attended the concert.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 許多人參加了音樂會。

examples.sentence: People like to travel.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 人們喜歡旅行。

examples.sentence: The people voted for change.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 人們投票支持變革。

meanings.meaning_en_US: An individual article or unit, especially one that is part of a list.

examples.sentence: Please check off each [item] on the list.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 請在清單上勾選每個[項目]。

examples.sentence: The first [item] on the agenda is budget review.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 議程上的第一個[項目]是預算審查。

examples.sentence: I need to buy one more [item].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我需要再買一個[項目]。

meanings.meaning_en_US: The sister of one's father or mother.

examples.sentence: My [aunt] is coming to visit us this weekend.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我的阿姨這個週末要來拜訪我們。

examples.sentence: She has a close relationship with her [aunt].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她和她的阿姨關係很親密。

examples.sentence: I used to spend my summers at my [aunt]'s house.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我以前的夏天都在我阿姨家度過。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A recording of moving visual images made digitally or on videotape.

examples.sentence: I watched a funny [video] online yesterday.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我昨天在網上看了一個有趣的視頻。

examples.sentence: The [video] quality was really high.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這個視頻的質量真高。

examples.sentence: She posted a [video] of her dance performance.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她發布了一段她舞蹈表演的視頻。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A person who is studying at a school or other educational institution.

examples.sentence: The [student] studied hard for the final exam.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這位學生為期末考試努力學習。

examples.sentence: She is an excellent [student] in her class.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她是班上的優秀學生。

examples.sentence: Every [student] has to complete their assignments on time.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 每位學生都必須按時完成作業。

meanings.meaning_en_US: Indicating necessity or obligation.

examples.sentence: You [must] finish your homework.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 你必須完成你的作業。

examples.sentence: We [must] leave now to catch the train.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我們現在必須離開以趕上火車。

examples.sentence: She [must] see this movie.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她必須看這部電影。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A greeting used to begin a conversation.

examples.sentence: [Hello], how are you?
examples.translation_zh_TW: 你好，你好嗎？

examples.sentence: She waved and said [hello].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她揮手說了你好

examples.sentence: [Hello], it's nice to see you!
examples.translation_zh_TW: 你好，很高興見到你！

meanings.meaning_en_US: To change direction or position.

examples.sentence: Please [turn] left at the next street.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 請在下一條街左轉。

examples.sentence: She will [turn] the pages of the book.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她將翻閱這本書的頁面。

examples.sentence: He had to [turn] back because he forgot something.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他不得不折回去，因為他忘了拿東西。
